title: Set Up a New Customer Account
description: A new retailer needs to be set up in the system before they can place their first order.

tasks.description: Gather all necessary information from the new customer (business name, address, tax ID, etc.).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the required data.

tasks.description: Create the new customer account in the CRM and ERP systems.
Assign a sales representative and default payment terms to the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent configures the new account with the correct settings.
